title: Farberware Over-the-Range Microwave Oven, 1.7 Cu. Ft. - 1000W - Auto Reheat, Multi-Stage Cooking, Melt/Soften Feature, Child Safety Lock, LED Display - Space Efficient & Powerful - White
description: Discover the efficiency and convenience of the Farberware 1.7 cu. ft. Over-the-Range Microwave Oven, a kitchen must-have for modern homes. Engineered for excellence with a 1000W power output and 1550W input, this microwave ensures your dishes are cooked evenly and swiftly. The spacious interior is perfect for various cooking needs, from quick snacks to elaborate meals. Special features like an LED kitchen timer and vent fan enhance usability, while the diverse cooking programs, including a snack menu and auto-cook options, cater to all your culinary desires. Defrosting is made effortless with time and weight settings, and the quick +30 second feature is ideal for fast-paced lifestyles. Additional functions like melt/soften settings and a potato program add versatility to your cooking repertoire. Safety is paramount with the child lock feature, ensuring a worry-free environment in your kitchen. The sleek, space-saving design complements any kitchen aesthetic, making it an essential appliance for every household.
